tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had excellent experience with the doctor. His work ethics are highly commendable and trust worthy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have been to several dentists since childhood since I had to wear braces twice over, and it's safe to say that my surgical experience at Dave dental clinic was the best by far. Deep rooted wisdom tooth surgical extraction was one of the most complicated procedures (even according to statistical records of such cases) with a long post op care and recovery time. The surgery done by Dr. Adithya Kwatra and Dr. Dave was smooth with extreme sensitivity to keep me mentally prepared for any pain that was to be anticipated. Guidance through the procedure is very important for any patient who is under local anaesthesia and knows what's going on during the surgery. That guidance was key to a satisfactory procedure for me. Furthermore, the support throughout post op care was amazing. I could text Dr. Dave at any point in time and he would revert with his advice as promptly as he could. 

I would strongly recommend Dr. Dave for the affordable dental care as well. The procedure I got done was charged 1/3rd at his clinic as compared to others. He was very frank about the affordablity he provides even with his consultation fee, which is only Rs. 200! 

I'm very satisfied and happy to have found Dr. Dave as the go to dentist and me and my family would love to maintain a long term association with him.
reply_text: Thanks a lot for such a detailed feedback. I know you are still recovering and some discomfort is there. Wishing you a speedy recovery. Regards

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have been visiting Dr. Vivek Dave since childhood. The doctor is very professional and gentle. I appreciate the way he explains the entire dental procedure. 
I have had 2 RCTs done from him and recently i visted him complaining  of severe pain in my lower left jaw. The doctor examined and suggested extraction of wisdom tooth upon examining the xray. The surgical procedure he performed was brilliant. The doctor makes sure to keep you very calm and relaxed while operating. The tooth was extracted successfully with minimal pain. I strongly recommend Dr. Dave for all dental related health issues. Thank you!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We visited Dr Dave as my mother had to get her teeth extracted. My mom was scared though she had in the past as well undergone similar procedures, the doctor was really polite and made sure that my mom was not nervous. Tooth extraction being a painful process can't be made entirely smooth but my mom did not feel more than an ounce of pain for which I am thankful to the doctor. ** ** ********** *** ** *** **** ** **** **** ****************** ******* Its been almost one and a half months since the visit and my mom's doing all fine now.
reply_text: Thanks a lot for such a detailed feedback, hope your mother is doing fine. Regards

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I had a decaying wisdom tooth & didn't wanted to visit a dentist for any treatment, as my previous experience of cavity filling was painful. Non of the doctors explained the procedure of tooth extraction or cavity filling, all the more it was highly priced as well. The medicines were also expensive. Dr. Dave was very transparent on the reason of tooth decay, the procedure of tooth removal & his prescribed medicines are very basic & cost effective... Though I did develope ulcers in my mouth *** ** **** ******* ***** *** ***** **** * **** ******* but it helped in curing the infection. My every qury was resolved over the whatsapp... He was very prompt & precise on his replies. Never experienced such quick responses from Doctors.. He even scheduled my tooth extraction appointment over the Whatsapp.. I just had to send in my X ray...  Dr. Dave is truly the new age Doctor who is using technology in the best way to minimize the wait & maximize the service & experience of his patients... 
A big thank you to practo team who introduced me to Dr. Vivek Dave.. I have visited Dr. A S Dave since my childhood.. The Dave family is bringing health to community generation after generation.. üëç‚úå
reply_text: Thanks a lot for such a detailed feedback, I hope that I am able to offer my services to the best of my abilities. Wish you a speedy recovery. Regards

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Vivek Dave is one of the extremely nice dentist I have met. He understands the problem and gives the best possible solution. Doesn't mislead you, very soft spoken doctor. Thanks a lot Dr Dave. I strongly recommend to visit him for all dental problems.
reply_text: Thanks for your encouraging words, hope you are doing well. Regards

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr.Vivek Dave is a young Dentist but with a lot of right kind of experience in Dentistry. I went to him for Root Canal Treatment on three of my teeth. He did the same over eight sittings including cleaning, crown fitting etc. He put me in a comfortable position from day one and treated without any fuss. Yesterday my treatment got completed. I am satisfied with the treatment and will recommend him to anybody with dental problems.
reply_text: Appreciate your feedback Mr Raman, hope you have successful tour. Regards

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Dave is a really great doctor. He is calm, patient and keeps checking in with you, if your ok, during the treatment. He is very flexible in terms of payment as well. I went in for a root canal treatment and the results are simply amazing. Thank you so much.
reply_text: Really appreciate your valuable feedback, hope to complete your treatment soon. Regards.
